Lyric:
[00:19.73]At last "Hello!" You've opened your eyes
[00:24.48]But why won't you even look me in the eyes? What's wrong with you?
[00:30.08]You angrily tell me that I'm late
[00:34.55]Well, I'm sorry but I did my best and running at my fastest pace
[00:39.57]My heart overtook my body as it flew to find you in this place
[00:45.27]Seeing your hair flowing and your bright eyes glowing aches my very core
[00:50.29]Wish I could breathe in the same dimension I don't want to let it go
[00:54.93]Now that I am finally faced with the voice I've known for so long
[01:00.14]I don't know what the words should be the very first I say to you
[01:07.46]Back in the zenzenzense until this day been looking everywhere for you
[01:12.11]I follow the sound of your innocent laughter and it guided me in the right way
[01:17.45]Even if every piece of you disappeared and if it scattered everywhere
[01:22.11]No I wouldn't waver, I would start back at one, look for you all over again
[01:27.21]Or maybe instead I'll take the whole universe right back to zero again
[01:43.14]Where should I start? How should I explain?
[01:47.49]Wanna tell you everything that happened while you were in a long long dream
[01:53.21]I flew through dozens of skies
[01:57.38]to tell you adventures I've been through hundreds of millions of light-years' worth
[02:02.46]But now I'm here finally seeing you reflected in my eyes
[02:07.98]I just want to know you ,play around and show you who it is that you can be
[02:13.28]I just want to love you, every fragment of you right down to the pain you feel
[02:17.99]Now that we have finally met at many galaxies' end
[02:23.20]I don't know how to hold your hand so that I don't break it
[02:30.31]Back in the Zenzenzense until this day been looking everywhere for you
[02:35.05]Oh, I let the sound of your unfettered voice and the shedding of tears lead me this way
[02:40.37]So tell me, who will ever gonna stop us on this "the eve of our revolution"
[02:45.18]No more hesitation, I will put up a flag to stake my claim on your heart tonight
[02:50.16]'Cause you took away from me the will to give up so clearly and awkwardly
[02:56.05]Whoa~~
[03:15.85]I wonder if we can push our way through
[03:20.38]the countless barriers that's waiting in the future just beyond our view
[03:26.18]Side by side, no way we can lose
[03:30.56]We'll beat destiny at its own game and make it follow our own rules
[03:35.55]And there isn't any weapon besides you that I need to use
[03:44.42]Zenzenzense 'til this day been looking everywhere for you
[03:48.65]I follow the sound of your innocent laughter and it guided me in the right way
[03:53.98]Even if every piece of you disappeared and if it scattered everywhere
[03:58.70]No, I won't waver. I will start back at one, look for you all over again
[04:03.86]For millions of light-years yet to come with a verse on my lips that will never end
